body: Same reason as emitExpr: in every place now we expect the value to be a Tensor. Tuples can only appear in assignments and in *expressions. This will be refactored similar to `emitExpr` once that changes. I am planning on adding tuple literals and making torch.cat( (a, b) ) work, and will change it in that PR.
